Client.Name: Shouhong Medical Holdings Group Co., Ltd

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Shouhong Medical Holdings Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011, headquartered in Qingdao, Shandong, with stock code 872872. For over a decade, the company has been committed to adhering to a professional development strategy centered on one-stop services for medical trade, bidding agency, and supply chain management, achieving rapid and large-scale business growth.
The company adheres to the service policy of "one-stop medical trade, safe search for Shouhong", establishes and effectively operates a complete set of safety service management system, and forms a service chain of hospital safety medical trade one-stop, agent safety medical trade one-stop, and manufacturer safety medical trade one-stop business system guided by Shouhong Medical Trade Safety Center and linked by Shouhong Real time Query Service System.
As a leader in the medical device market in Shandong Province, Shouhong Medical Group has been cooperating with Fortune 500 companies for many years to provide comprehensive solutions for hospitals, manufacturers, and agents in international trade, bidding agency, medical equipment sales, medical investment, and circulation management services. With the mission of promoting compliance and safety in medical supply chain management, Shouhong Medical Group aims to build a multi-dimensional, open, innovative, and win-win security service ecosystem.
